name: Time to Die (Sydmen)
description:
THEY CAST YOU OUT FOR BEING A ONE SIDED DIE.

NOW IT'S TIME FOR THEM TO DIE

In this game, you play as a die forced to go through a casino while having to gamble on all your stats in the process. Will you take the risk?

Sydmen - Programming and Sound Effects
thiccsnail - Art, Sound Effects, and Level Design
